title: Best of the Program | Guest: Matt Ridley | 11/29/21
description:
Glenn and Stu discuss the new “Omicron” variant of COVID and the fearmongering coverage by the media. Author Matt Ridley joins to discuss the Omicron variant and his new book, "Viral." YouTube is hiding Glenn's COVID special, and Amazon is selling summary books of Glenn’s newest book before it’s even been released.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
